attractions.name: Minato Mirai 21
attractions.description: A modern waterfront district featuring shopping malls, an amusement park, and panoramic skyline views.

attractions.name: Yokohama Chinatown
attractions.description: Japan’s largest Chinatown, filled with colorful gates, shops, and authentic Chinese cuisine.

attractions.name: Cup Noodles Museum
attractions.description: Interactive museum where visitors can learn about instant ramen and make their own custom cup noodles.

attractions.name: Yamashita Park
attractions.description: A seaside park with walking paths, gardens, and views of Yokohama Bay Bridge and ships.

attractions.name: Landmark Tower Sky Garden
attractions.description: One of Japan’s tallest buildings, offering 360-degree views from its observation deck.
